mapper.insert: insert into DA (daid,daname,daptype,daPDetailType,daFunc,daFuncType,daImpact,daFacilitiesType, daFacilitiesPurposeOfUse, daSystemSW,daReportIF,daStorageDevice, daModifyOPAvailability,daModifiableOperationData,daHMIType,daIdentifyType,daUse, daManufacturer, daModel, daRegistrarID, daLastUpdateID,daRegDate, daUpdateDate) values (#{daid},#{daname},#{daptype},#{daPDetailType},#{daFunc},#{daFuncType},#{daImpact}, #{daFacilitiesType},#{daFacilitiesPurposeOfUse},#{daSystemSW},#{daReportIF},#{daStorageDevice}, #{daModifyOPAvailability},#{daModifiableOperationData},#{daHMIType},#{daIdentifyType},#{daUse}, #{daManufacturer},#{daModel},#{daRegistrarID},#{daLastUpdateID}, #{daRegDate},#{daUpdateDate})
